constantValues: An action that is or was performed on a patient. This can be a physical intervention like an operation, or less invasive like counseling or hypnotherapy.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: categoryId

constantValues: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A code that classifies the procedure for searching, sorting and display purposes (e.g. "Surgical Procedure").

members.name: dateTime

constantValues: The date(time)/period over which the procedure was performed.

members.description: The date(time)/period over which the procedure was performed.

members.name: description

constantValues: The name of the custom entity.

members.description: The name of the custom entity.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: encounterId

constantValues: The encounter during which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The encounter during which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: episodeOfCareId

constantValues: The encounter during which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The encounter during which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: groupId

constantValues: The person, animal or group on which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The person, animal or group on which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: locationId

constantValues: The location where the procedure actually happened. E.g. a newborn at home, a tracheotomy at a restaurant.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The location where the procedure actually happened. E.g. a newborn at home, a tracheotomy at a restaurant.

members.name: notDone

constantValues: Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure was NOT performed.

members.description: Set this to true if the record is saying that the procedure was NOT performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: notDoneReasonId

constantValues: A code indicating why the procedure was not performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: A code indicating why the procedure was not performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: outcomeId

constantValues: The outcome of the procedure - did it resolve reasons for the procedure being performed?

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The outcome of the procedure - did it resolve reasons for the procedure being performed?

foreignKeyAttribute.name: patientId

constantValues: The person, animal or group on which the procedure was performed.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: The person, animal or group on which the procedure was performed.

members.name: performedEndDate

constantValues: The period End date over which the procedure was performed. Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured

members.description: The period End date over which the procedure was performed. Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured

members.name: performedStartDate

constantValues: The period start date over which the procedure was performed. Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured

members.description: The period start date over which the procedure was performed. Allows a period to support complex procedures that span more than one date, and also allows for the length of the procedure to be captured

members.name: procedureIdentifier

constantValues: This records identifiers associated with this procedure that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate

members.description: This records identifiers associated with this procedure that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate

members.name: status

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: A code specifying the state of the procedure. Generally this will be in-progress or completed state.

members.description: A code specifying the state of the procedure. Generally this will be in-progress or completed state.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'status_display' is added to the 'Procedure' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'status'
addSupportingAttribute.name: status_display

members.name: subjectType

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

constantValues: Type of Subject on whom procedure is performed

members.description: Type of Subject on whom procedure is performed

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'subjectType_display' is added to the 'Procedure' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'subjectType'
addSupportingAttribute.name: subjectType_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Procedure' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.name: statusCode

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Procedure

members.description: Reason for the status of the Procedure

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Procedure' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

definitions.description: An action that is or was performed on a patient. This can be a physical intervention like an operation, or less invasive like counseling or hypnotherapy.
